column4: Tesla's Autopilot to get 'full self-driving feature' in August
column5: Shares of Tesla Inc  rose as much as 5 percent on Monday after Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk tweeted that its Autopilot driver assistance system will get full self-driving features following a software upgrade in August. | Video

column4: UPDATE 1-Tesla's Autopilot to get "full self-driving feature" in August
column5: June 11 Shares of Tesla Inc rose as much as 5 percent on Monday after Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk tweeted that its Autopilot driver assistance system will get full self-driving features following a software upgrade in August.
